mapper.select: SELECT cube.CUBE_ID, cube.TITLE, cube.DESCRIPTION, cube.RECOMMEND, cube.RECOMMEND_CNT, drama.DRAMA_ID, drama.CHANNEL, drama.TOTAL_VIEWS_CT, drama.DRAMA_INFO, drama.OPEN_TIME, drama.CLOSE_TIME, drama.CLOSE_TIME, drama.MAIN_THUMBNAIL, drama.SUB_THUMBNAIL, drama.CAPTION1, drama.CAPTION2, drama.CAPTION3, drama.CAPTION4, drama.CAPTION5 FROM TB_MVSS_CUBE cube, TB_MVSS_DRAMA drama WHERE cube.TYPE_CD = '01' AND cube.CUBE_ID = drama.CUBE_ID AND cube.STATUS_CD = '01' ORDER BY cube.RECOMMEND, cube.CREATED_DATE DESC LIMIT 8
